categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A Force-sensitive Selkath Jedi served in the Clone Wars, a galaxy-wide conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. During an engagement with a squad of B2 super battle droids, the Selkath wielded a protosaber with a green crystal, slashing one of the droids across the torso with the saber and using telekinesis to push it into its squadmates. The Jedi was blue-skinned, had black eyes, and wore brown and gray robes.

The Selkath Jedi appeared in an image created for the Jedi Academy Training Manual, a resource guide for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game published by Wizards of the Coast in 2009. The image was used to demonstrate a combat technique called the "Pushing Slash."
